Summary: Manchester,TN Orange/Amber Orb with flashing lights that came out of it. HWY 41
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around October 14th 2011
divs: sighting detailsoct. 2011 about 9:30 at night on murfreesboro hwy\ 41 there is a dark 6 mile stretch of road. we were heading from town (manchester,tn.) toward the interstate and a bp gas station(busy corner truck stop and market). we (3 of us in the car) have witnessed this 3 different times now within a months time. all 3 events each time took place about mid-way on this 6 mile stretch. around where some fields are. we witnessed a good size orange to amber colored orb hovering just above the treeline, it almost looked like a big orange star but stars do not hover above a treeline, that's what caught our eye, it's placement seemed odd. we take this road 5 times a week and noticed as we were driving up on it that it looked very out of place. i then pulled over on the shoulder of the road to get a better look. the orb hovered for a few seconds more and then seem to disappear or change into what looked like a white star like object, it moved through the sky very fluently and went over to what we thought was just a star (also pretty low in the sky), it connected to it and moved off as one. then it seemed to turn into a white flashing light object and began moving at a high velocity, we watched it until it moved out of our field of vision. the orange orb thing was almost like a portal or host that this object came out of or so it seemed? it was very amazing to see to say the least...
